name: Disconnect the tanks (Rui Moreira)
description:
Mankind is on the verge of extinction, you are the only one who can prevent it to happen. To do that, you will have to deal with the enemys Tanks, who are trying to destroy your towers. Destroy all enemys and craft some Power Cells, after that, all you have to do is to reconnect all towers to the main source. Good luck, mankind depends on you.

This Game was made in 1 Week, for the 2022 Lost Relic Games GameJam, developed by a team of three. Me Rui Moreira (3D Assets, Character Artist and UI Developer), Álvaro Pinto (Enemy Character Artist and Animator) and Jorge Antão (Programmer, Environment Artist and UX Developer).

Althoug i had work on the character since modelling to rigging, due to time pressure, we were not able to use it.

Rocks by Alen Vejzovic 
Terrain textures by Julio Sillet
Music by Low Slung
Sound effects from freesound.
